movies.title: The Polka King
movies.plot: Local Pennsylvania polka legend Jan Lewan develops a plan to get rich that shocks his fans and lands him in jail.

events.title: Jan Lewan's wife wins the Mrs. Pennsylvania contest
Jan Lewan is found guilty of fraud

movies.title: Brian Banks
movies.plot: An All-American football player's dreams to play in the NFL are halted when he is falsely accused of rape and sent to prison.
